DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to elucidate whether the additional mechanism of analgesia, i.e. reuptake inhibition of norepinephrine, of tapentadol leads to a change in different pain signs and symptoms in comparison to oxycodone.
DOC.brief_title: Tapentadol Versus Oxycodon - a Mechanism-based Treatment Approach in Neuropathic Pain
DOC.criteria: thermal or mechanical hyperalgesia chronic neuropathic pain (NRS => 6) nonspecific
